text: @Cernovich The politics of a socialist coup. Major cities=sanctuary cities. All controlled by Dem-socialists& hurt bad by COVID-19 bc they were cesspools already. Look at Pelosi, Schiff, Swalwell, Waters, Schumer, DeBlasio, &Cuomo's areas. No publicity please...trashed.
